name: Fast Bubble
storyline: Fast Bubble was a really simple game that made complicated to finish,most of it was my fault,taken bad desicisions as design view,game design and the most important thing:not to find a good partner programmer to help me with the game,but with help of my partner Francesco Marra the game was finally finished after 10 months of hard work
summary:
Fast Bubble is a simple casual android game for people of all ages where you must demonstrate your reflexes and speed to exploit the bubbles before they explode.  
  
The rules are simple, touch the bubbles to earn points, each bubble has a different score value, if you do not touch a bubble before it explodes this will subtract a life point.  
If you touch a bomb you lose and also lose if you run out of life points.  
  
Compete with everyone to get the highest score possible!  
  
Enjoy Fast Bubble alone and with friends.
